privacy_policy.name: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Public-facing privacy notice required under POPIA

requirements.name: Responsible Party Identity
requirements.description: Name and address of the responsible party
requirements.checkText: The privacy policy must clearly identify who is collecting the data

requirements.name: Purpose of Processing
requirements.description: Purpose for which personal information is collected
requirements.checkText: Must explain why personal information is being collected

requirements.name: Categories of Information
requirements.description: Description of categories of personal information collected
requirements.checkText: Must list what types of personal information are collected

requirements.name: Recipients of Information
requirements.description: Recipients or categories of recipients to whom information may be supplied
requirements.checkText: Must identify who may receive the personal information

requirements.name: Voluntary or Mandatory
requirements.description: Whether supply of information is voluntary or mandatory
requirements.checkText: Should indicate if providing information is optional or required

requirements.name: Consequences of Non-Supply
requirements.description: Consequences of failure to provide information
requirements.checkText: Should explain what happens if information is not provided

requirements.name: Data Subject Rights
requirements.description: Right to access, correct, and object to processing
requirements.checkText: Must inform data subjects of their rights under POPIA

requirements.name: Right to Complain
requirements.description: Right to lodge a complaint with the Information Regulator
requirements.checkText: Must inform of right to complain to the Information Regulator

requirements.name: Cross-Border Transfers
requirements.description: Information about transfers outside South Africa
requirements.checkText: Must disclose if data is transferred outside South Africa

requirements.name: Security Measures
requirements.description: Description of security measures to protect information
requirements.checkText: Should describe how personal information is protected

requirements.name: Retention Period
requirements.description: How long personal information will be retained
requirements.checkText: Should specify how long data will be kept

requirements.name: Cookies and Tracking
requirements.description: Information about cookies and online tracking
requirements.checkText: Should disclose use of cookies and tracking technologies

requirements.name: Children's Information
requirements.description: Special provisions for processing children's information
requirements.checkText: Should address processing of children's personal information if applicable

requirements.name: Automated Decision-Making
requirements.description: Information about automated decision-making
requirements.checkText: Should disclose automated decision-making if used

requirements.name: Policy Updates
requirements.description: How changes to the policy will be communicated
requirements.checkText: Should explain how policy changes will be communicated

data_processing_agreement.name: Data Processing Agreement (Operator Agreement)
data_processing_agreement.description: Agreement between responsible party and operator under Section 21

requirements.name: Parties Identification
requirements.description: Clear identification of responsible party and operator
requirements.checkText: Must identify the responsible party and operator

requirements.name: Processing Instructions
requirements.description: Operator must process only on instructions of responsible party
requirements.checkText: Must specify that operator acts only on documented instructions

requirements.name: Security Obligations
requirements.description: Operator must establish and maintain security measures
requirements.checkText: Must require operator to implement security measures

requirements.name: Confidentiality
requirements.description: Operator must treat information as confidential
requirements.checkText: Must require operator to maintain confidentiality

requirements.name: Sub-Processors
requirements.description: Requirements for engaging sub-processors
requirements.checkText: Must address use of sub-processors

requirements.name: Assistance Obligations
requirements.description: Operator must assist with data subject requests
requirements.checkText: Should require operator to assist with data subject requests

requirements.name: Breach Notification
requirements.description: Notification requirements for security compromises
requirements.checkText: Must require notification of security breaches

requirements.name: Data Deletion/Return
requirements.description: Return or deletion of data upon termination
requirements.checkText: Must address data handling upon termination

requirements.name: Audit Rights
requirements.description: Right to audit operator's compliance
requirements.checkText: Should include audit rights

requirements.name: Cross-Border Transfers
requirements.description: Restrictions on international transfers
requirements.checkText: Must address cross-border data transfers

consent_form.name: Consent Form
consent_form.description: Form for obtaining data subject consent

requirements.name: Organization Identity
requirements.description: Clear identification of who is collecting consent
requirements.checkText: Must identify who is collecting consent

requirements.name: Specific Purpose
requirements.description: Specific purpose for which consent is sought
requirements.checkText: Must specify the exact purpose of processing

requirements.name: Voluntary Nature
requirements.description: Consent must be voluntary
requirements.checkText: Must indicate consent is voluntary

requirements.name: Right to Withdraw
requirements.description: Information about withdrawing consent
requirements.checkText: Must explain how to withdraw consent

requirements.name: Signature/Confirmation
requirements.description: Clear mechanism for recording consent
requirements.checkText: Must have clear consent mechanism

requirements.name: Date
requirements.description: Date consent was given
requirements.checkText: Should record date of consent

dataSubjectRights.name: Right of Access
dataSubjectRights.description: Right to request confirmation and access to personal information

dataSubjectRights.name: Right to Correction
dataSubjectRights.description: Right to request correction or deletion of inaccurate information

dataSubjectRights.name: Right to Deletion
dataSubjectRights.description: Right to request deletion of personal information

dataSubjectRights.name: Right to Object
dataSubjectRights.description: Right to object to processing for direct marketing

dataSubjectRights.name: Right to Complain
dataSubjectRights.description: Right to lodge a complaint with the Information Regulator

lawfulProcessingConditions.name: Consent
lawfulProcessingConditions.description: Data subject has consented to processing

lawfulProcessingConditions.name: Contract
lawfulProcessingConditions.description: Processing is necessary for a contract

lawfulProcessingConditions.name: Legitimate Interest
lawfulProcessingConditions.description: Processing is necessary for legitimate interests

lawfulProcessingConditions.name: Public Interest
lawfulProcessingConditions.description: Processing is necessary for public interest
